reuters.title: TIE/COMMUNICATIONS <TIE> RENEWS AGREEMENTS
reuters.body: TIE/Communications Inc said it has renewed agreements to sell its GTE Corp <GTE>, Bell Atlantic Corp <BEL>, NYNEX Corp <NYN> and US West Inc <USW> for two years. The company is providing small to mid-siezed key telephone systems to GTE and key systems, hybrids and DATA STAR PABX systems to the others. Reuter 
